name: Pip Haversham
title: Shopkeeper
description: A cheerful halfling with rosy cheeks and an infectious smile. His shop is tidy and welcoming, with every item neatly organized and clearly priced.

greeting.first_time: Oh hello! Welcome to Haversham's! I'm Pip, and this is my family's store. How wonderful to have a visitor! What can I help you find?
greeting.returning: Back so soon! Lovely to see you again, dear!
greeting.low_gold: Oh my, I've been buying quite a lot today! My coin purse is looking rather empty. Perhaps check back tomorrow?

main_menu.text: What brings you to our little shop today?

browse_shop.text: Please, have a look around! Everything's priced fairly—we pride ourselves on honest business here in Millhaven!

sell_items.text: Oh, you have things to sell? Wonderful! Let me see what you've got—I'll buy anything useful, as long as I have the coin!
sell_items.failure: Oh dear, I'm terribly sorry, but I've spent all my coin today. Come back tomorrow and I'll have more!

ask_about_village.text: Millhaven's a lovely place! Quiet, peaceful, everyone knows everyone. We get fresh produce from the farms every morning. It's a simple life, but a good one!

goodbye.text: Safe travels, dear! Don't be a stranger—come back anytime!
